abstract: North Korea proposes talks with South Korea, following up on August 2015 agreement to open dialogue between two nations on demilitarizing border.
lead_paragraph: Working-level officials will hold the talks next week in Panmunjom to prepare for senior-level dialogue in Seoul or Pyongyang.

headline.main: North and South Korea Agree to Hold Border Talks
headline.print_headline: North Korea Seeks Talks With South

snippet: Working-level officials will hold the talks next week in Panmunjom to prepare for senior-level dialogue in Seoul or Pyongyang.
